text: Vengeance (2002) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE). It took place on July 21, 2002 at the Joe Louis Arena in Detroit, Michigan. It was the second Vengeance event held by WWE. This was the first PPV to feature John Cena, who defeated Chris Jericho. ==Results== ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Vengeance 2002 website Category:2002 in professional wrestling Category:Sports in Detroit Category:WWE Vengeance Category:2002 in the United States Category:2000s in Detroit Category:July 2002 events
title: Vengeance (2002)
